name: Cricket Academy PRO - Learn Cricket Skills
name_original: Cricket Academy PRO - Learn Cricket Skills
description:
Learn the Cricket with passion.
Cricket Academy PRO present the v1.0 of Cricket Academy PRO for the users of iPhone & iPad to learn the Cricket diffrenetly. Beginners and professionals can practice these shots and skilss.
* Batting, bowling and fielding.
* Front foot and back foot shots and drives.
* Scoop shots and sweeps.
* Yorkers and bouncers.
* Spin and fast bolwing.
* Googlies and DOOSRA's.
* Catching and throwing.
* Wicket keeping and much more.

Then you can compare your performance by recording your video and after watching these videos, you will definitely realize where to improve yourself as a PRO Cricket player.
Video toturials of professional trainers are also included.
Application contains HD videos that contains coaching and practice stuff for beginners as well.
Download and enjoy.
